nodes.bodyText: Just IDEA suggesting terser syntax by converting to expression-lambda.
What happens when we try to serialize ArtifactStore, the store needs to be serialized but deep down it does have a cipher.
It depends on the ArtifactStore type adapter. If it attempts to do a toJson() on it rather than computing a set of decrypted secrets, it will blow up. I'll take a look.

It looks like it would work, unless I'm missing something.
For serialization, we never descend that far into configuration properties. We do this instead:
https://github.com/marques-work/gocd/blob/ff49b4ff9ce81f2379e2382ad8db362ab7e331bc/common/src/main/java/com/thoughtworks/go/remote/Serialization.java#L184-L190
And for deserialization, we do the reverse. The Gson instance never encounters a GoCipher instance:
https://github.com/marques-work/gocd/blob/ff49b4ff9ce81f2379e2382ad8db362ab7e331bc/common/src/main/java/com/thoughtworks/go/remote/Serialization.java#L197-L199
So we shouldn't blow up here. We can add a test though.
